title: Chief Strategic Engagement and Public Affairs Manager
description:
You will have experience of managing and developing teams.Working in DWP as a Public Affairs Manager means becoming part of one of the best communications teams across Government.

The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for 80,000 staff, an annual budget of over £170bn and is bringing forward the biggest changes to welfare and pensions for a generation.

Strategic Engagement is a key principle of how Government needs to communicate now and in the future, and we’re looking for the right person to lead and develop an effective team who deliver first-class communications.
